pullRequest.title: [M] Added paging functionality to the JobResource.listJobStatuses endpoint (ENT-2527)
pullRequest.bodyText:
The JobResource.listJobStatuses endpoint now supports paging the
results if specified by the caller

commit.message:
Added paging functionality to the JobResource.listJobStatuses endpoint

- The JobResource.listJobStatuses endpoint now supports paging the
  results if specified by the caller

nodes.bodyText:
Depending on what we decide to do with paging on the spec-first branch (here), we want to either remove this and add a PageRequest pageRequest = ResteasyProviderFactory.getContextData(PageRequest.class); at the start of the method, or add a card to add the pagination here in the way that Ondrej did it.
Maybe it's time to rebase spec-first against master?
